long_description: This handy extra-large duffel bag is great for stowing and air-drying wet gear or clothing. Durably constructed of heavy-duty nylon mesh with reinforced zippers, wrap-around webbing handles and double-stitched main seams. Nylon bottom prevents items inside the duffel from coming in contact with other surfaces. Zippered pocket with key keeper is perfect for storing valuables. Bag stuffs into its own zippered pocket for compact storage. D-rings provide attachment for optional shoulder strap, sold separately.
short_description: This handy extra-large duffel bag is great for stowing and air-drying wet gear or clothing.
